name: An Egg Can Dream
description:
Everyone has a dream, even an egg.

Roll your way around to live out your dreams in a world where you don't always belong.

You play as an egg. You have goals, dreams, desires and a passion.
Explore the world in a way that only an egg can and progress through the story of your life.

-----Features-----
Third Person Rolling Action
Physics Based Objects
Comic Book Style Story Cut-Scenes
Original Soundtrack by M0r53C0d3
